Default Password as the last 6 digits of gateway ID
Enable Notification function in "Settings" - "Notification Center" and keep network in good condition
Database file error, restart the Smart Home HD
For security purpose, suggest modifying the gateway name and password in time
Password length must be 6 digits or above
Network abnormal, make sure the network is connected!
No history record can be loaded
For security purpose, recommend to modify the gateway account and password in time
Release to load more data immediately
Please email us the error information, thank you!
Bind failed due to password has been changed.\nPlease login gateway and add camera.
Please enter the unique identification code on the camera housing

Are you sure to delete the selected data?
Deleted data can not be recovered, want to delete?
Gateway connection status shows how your software, network and gateway is connected
Gateway can not connect,please check the network
Are you sure to remove the camera?
Make sure that all joint action devices removed and save the remove, and then delete the linkage tasks
Time is not bounded,click to bound it!
Open all lighting and curtains, and cancel defenses
Turn off all lighting, sockets, valves and curtains, and set up defense system
No device has joined the gateway, please add devices to set scene.
Choose scene according to your need
Tip:Scenes will be generated automatically according to your current area configuration.If the configuration changes, you need to modify the scene manually.
Please input the customized scene name
Are you sure to delete scene?
Turn off all lighting and curtains, and set up defense system
Turn on all lighting, sockets, valves and draw curtains,and cancel defense
No scene is available, please click to add
No timer scene is available, please click to add
Please select house type or skip
Delete the group, and the devices of this group will be shifted to the "Others" group.
Delete all the relevant settings or not when remove the device?
Your gateway version is old,please enable network adding mode manually. Find the gateway set button and quick click 4 times

Automatical net adding mode fails,please open net adding mode of the gateway manually,find the gateway set button Quickly press 4 times. If you are the first time to add the new device, the gateway might be setting ZigBee network, please try again after 3 mins.
Adding network success: the device on the indicator lights flash three times, and remain bright.
Choose appropriate digits according to your door model.
Default group can not be deleted
Your device will flash for ten seconds,please be alerted!

1.Ensure IR transmitter is online and in appropriate position 
2.Click [Next] successively for automatic matching, until the device is turned on, then it is matched 
3. Click the test button, if it performs normally that means matches successfully 
4.If the test failed, select [Last] or [Next], until test successfully.
Key number has reached the maximum
Please enter name of new area
Area name can not be Null
Add device into network:quick click SET key 4 times, if there is no SET key, please click OPEN key 4 times.
Default group can not be edited
Camera gateway has been recognized. Gateway ID will be changed to 12 digits automatically , do you want to configure the network now?
select when the mobile phone connect
Open scenes or devices quickly via NFC tag
Shake phone to open scenes or devices quickly
Your devices do not support NFC
NFC device has not been opened
Scenes and devices can perform automatically through WiFi
Please select a scene or device!
Turn off all lighting and curtains, and set up defense system
You have to open GPS if you want to use this function, set it now?
Find New Version (please watch this vedio: http://youtu.be/cw4_BsQNxqY , and you will be impressed by our smart home system.rsion.)?
Gateway title can not be null
Password must be 6-16 characters without blank
The new password must be different from the old one!
The new password and password to confirm do not match!
A new version of gateway is available. Update now?
Gateway name concerns your security, you can set personalized name
New password is the same as the old one!
If close, all the timer scenes you set will be invalid, continue to close?
Once enabled, the timer scenes will perform according to settings you made.
The password has been modified,please re-login
Unable to connect to the network
1.Find the gateway and quick click sys key 8 times, then the password will be reset to default.
2.If the 1st way does not work, the gateway version is too old. You need to press sys key for 10 seconds to reset.
WARNING: Return to default setting will lose all data of the gateway, please be cautious
Scan the QR code and follow Wuliancg
Please feel free to leave any message, even if few words
Simple, clear, refreshing and more humanized design, which brings you more comfortable experience.
Add the function of search gateway in LAN. Multi-ways to login the gateway which brings more convenient and smart experience.
Contrary to previous, you can set the device as advanced linkage device and add the linkage task, it is more logical,simple and clear for the way of people\'s thinking
Long press the button can set the scene, integrating many functions into one button, and operation is more clear
Add the new area management function which has better real-life experience and better service.
Select a volume, click click to listen to test volume of dream flower
No device is connected to current router
Current state is whitelist mode, if you want to chang to blacklist mode, please go to the web page!
Password length can not be less than 8
You select to encrpt the WiFi, the default password is 12345678. You can also choose to modify the password
Please select the green channel, in order to minimize signal interference of your gateway.

After the speed Qos need to use in a networked setting - Speed monitoring - speed setting. Open will be based on your connection speed setting device, connected device will not turn off the speed limit.
After Smart speed is ON, it will smartly limit the speed to connected device; After OFF, it will limit the speed to connected device according to the manual setting.
You can connect network, only when your device is conncted to the WiFi of this gateway.
When purcussing dream flower vase body, your click will execute corresponding shining mode
Select the starting and ending time, the dream flower will display related information during this period
The new password and password to confirm does not match!
If (When any of the following events occur)
AND: All conditions must occur simultaneously
Choose one scene or more, if chosen scene is active,then restricted condition is established.
Create a linkage that help you perform some tasks automatically.
Invalid operation to inside unit of gateway.
The rule has not been configured completely
Sure to give up editing current housekeeper rule or not?
A brief description of the rule, Optional field.
Start time can not be later than the end time
Password length can not be longer than 20
Or: when any one condition occurs
The housekeeper will perform the task you set, only during the following period.
Once started, the time of your cellphone will sync to the gateway automatically.
This rule name has been used, please change the name.
Choose a scene and select a corresponding state (activation or deactivation) as the trigge event.
There is no encryption mode, please select a encryption mode
The mailbox has been used, do you forget the password?
User names can only be composed of letters or numbers, and the first one must be a letter.
Format of cellphone number is incorrect,please enter correct cellphone number.
Hello, please choose one of the following way to get it back
Sorry, housekeeper update failed, please select next step. If it aways fails,please try to clear scene data.
The cellphone number has been used, do you forget the password?
This user name already exists, please try a new user name.
The current time zone of your cellphone is half time zone, default gateway time zone is the adjacent time zone to your phone current zone.

We have a significant upgrade of linkage function. New functions can be used in Housekeeper module. Now you just need to complete the last step, then you can use the Housekeeper. Upgrade Housekeeper now? Please note when migration complete, the earlier version of the APP linkage function can not be used anymore.
Please enter your cellphone number correctly, and click below to get cellphone verification code. Cellphone certification binding is completed after you fill the form.
Password is too long. Do not exceed 20 digits.
The account does not exist, please try again.

Enter your email address as a certification to get back you password when you lose it. When the form is completed, we will send a confirmation email to your mailbox, please remember to check it and finish the mailbox certification binding following the steps that are shown in the mail.
When the scene data is cleared, common tasks and linkage task of scene and timer scene will be cleared too. You will need to reset the data. Are you sure to continue?
Click button below to get verification code, and you will recieve message with verification code by your cellphone
, enter the verification code and click next to modify password.Please keep your verification message safely to avoid password leakage by third-party .
You have not bound mailbox, please bind one!
Please enter the verification code first.
Please read the Registration Agreement first
Password is too short, need at least 6 digits.
Default gateway time zone is the same time zone as your cellphone.
Get to know your new Housekeeper now.
The password can not contain spaces or other blank characters.
You have not bound cellphone number, please bind one first!
For your account security, we need to verify the validity of the cellphone
E-mail format is incorrect, please enter the correct email address.
Please keep this mail safely to avoid password leakage by third-party.
A confirmation letter has been sent to your mailbox, please login mail to confirm
Click the e-mail sending button below,and a Password Reset secure email will be send to
User name can not be composed of only numbers.
We have sent you a Password Reset email, please login your mailbox to modify the password.
User name length must between 6-20 digits.
Upgrade timeout. The gateway will continue to update for you automatically on the backstage
Select and set a scene as scene trigger event, trigger with its activation state or deactivation state.
Select execution time and circulate time as a trigger event.
Select a device as trigger event, trigger with its start state or close state.
Select execution time and circulate time as time restricted condition.
Select a device of restricted condition and the device status as the restricted condition will take effect.
Select one scene or more, when the scene is on, the restricted condition will take effect.
Sorry your gateway version does not support Housekeeper function.
Click here to set the trigger event, when the trigger event occur, the following set task will be executed.
Click here to set restricted condition, when the trigger event occurs, the following set task will be executed only when restricted condition is satisfied.
Click here to set the event you want to execute
This moment the scene is at Home
<font color = "#719e19"> Execute </font> Turn on the light
<font color = "#719e19"> Execute </font>Close the curtain, delay five seconds
The selected scene is in activation state
Change the state of selected scene from activation to deaction

Plug-in does not exist, whether to download?

Change password failed, please try again.

Unable to add a new device, the maximum limit on the number of your gateway device has been reached. We recommend that you replace a higher-capacity gateway, or delete some equipment of the gateway and then add.
Please enter your gateway address as located
You have unedited task, we mark them with red border box, please complete editing.
You can not add a new device, the device task has reached the maximum number of 60,suggest delete part of the task and add.

Please password, fingerprint, door cards three ways a way to open the door, the system will present thisOpening the way for the anti-stress open record. After saving is complete, then the door in this manner will receive notice under duress same gateway. Please complete the operation within three minutes.
Your current anti-stress way to fingerprint door open, if it is confirmed in this way to open the door as an anti-stress, please click the OK button; To re-enter Please click on the Cancel button.
Get data fails, check your network
Adding voice number is greater than the maximum allowed for the upcoming 100, can not be completed to add!
The current folder has the same name as the file exists!
Are you sure want to delete the selected file?
The current directory is root directory, you can not modify the folder.
Message will be send in the name of this device.
WiFi channel is too close to gateway channel.
To dectect if WiFi channel conflict with gateway channel.
WiFi channel conflict with gateway channel.
Authorized Gateway Does Not Support Password Modification
Authorize to Login the Current Gateway

Tap Control Center>Authorization Management>"+"Button on top right corner, search for the Account, share the products within your gateway with other users, and then this users may login your gateway without inputting password. You can modify their access authority or delete their login authority.
Please Input Your Mobile Phone Number
Wulian Account Can Be Bound Only Once and Can\'t Be Modified after the Binding
This Mobile Phone Number Has Been Used by Others
This Mobile Phone Number Has Been Bound!
After the Unbinding, the Other Party Cannot Login This Gateway
Bound User Can\'t Reauthorize to Others

If Authorization Is Allowed, This User May Access This Gateway without Inputting Password

The Authorized User Does Not Have the Permission

Sorry, No Permission to Access This Function

This Email has Been Certified and Used by Other Account
User with No Permission or Illegal Identity
Authentication Failure (Invalid Third Party), Return from the Browser
Device Password Error. Binding Not Allowed
You May Register with Mobile Phone Number
Necessary Parameter Shall Not Be Empty
Username or Password Error, Token Verification Failure
With deletion of Offline Products comes deletion of the related settings
1. After the deletion of Online Products, the device shall quit the network
3. Please read the User Manual for the devices without SET button to quit the network
2. Long press the SET Button for 10s to quit the network. If it succeeds, System Indicator flashes 4 times.
Methods for devices to quit the network:
Quitting the network means restoring to factory default setting. Please make networking settings before its next use

After quitting the network, the device shall be marked “Offline”. Device “Offline” may be caused either by network quit, or by dead battery, unstable signal due to long distance between the device and the gateway, gateway restoration to factory default setting or device failure. After the deletion of Offline Products, the products shall disappear from the List of Devices, relevant settings may also be deleted, but it will not lead to network quit.
Deletion of online products shall lead to network quit. Please make networking settings before its next use
Click button on top right corner and input identification code of Smart Door Guardian
Only cellphone number in mainland China supported
Please log into email to identify.
Connection failed, please return and try again
Please follow the voice prompts to the next step
The slave is bound with fog computing host. It will be restored to the status before binding if it is unbound from the host. Unbind?
Failed. Switch for casual user is off.
Formatting will cause all data on the SD card to be erased.
SD card cannot be read, please format card.
Formatting will cause SD card to be FAT32 and all data will be erased.
It takes around 1 minute to connect to network. Please wait.
Access Control Center to change camera name.
Sending request to device. Please wait.
Please wait. Cylincam will stop rotating after 1 minute.
Mobile traffic will be generated and audio, video quality will be affected in mobile network.
Smart Door Guardian, IP Camera, Hard Disk Recorder, Cloud Ⅲ Camera

Channel uninitialized. Please exit and try again.
Channel connection parameters error. Please exit and try again.
Device connection error. Try again later.

1. The gateway will automatically synchronize its time with the Internet time after connected to the Internet. You can also synchronize gateway time with your mobile phone time on LAN manually;\n2. It can only synchronize time, not time zone.

To avoid interference with the gateway signal, forbid the "auto" mode of the router channel.
Password length cannot be longer than 20
It is recommended to set WiFi repeater for the first login
Please choose the channel with green mark, incase of interference with the gateway signal
This WiFi channel has caused interference to the gateway signal. Please change the router channel to 1~5
Someone is knocking at the door
Someone is pounding on the door
No data for the selected date
Indicator reflects the status of the gateway, please turn it on in time when operating!
Current WiFi channel has caused interference to the gateway signal. Please change the router channel to 1~5

Select WiFi that needs to be repeated
Signal interfered, please change the router channel to 1~5
Signal interfered, please change the router channel to 9-13
Channel collision is detected, please change the router channel to 9-13
Channel collision is detected, please change the router channel to 1-5
Switch from Router Mode to Repeater Mode?
Detected that WiFi channel conflicts with ZigBee channel, please solve it.
When the WiFi channel conflicts with ZigBee channel, the device in the gateway may be offline, which will influence your daily use of the device. You can solve it by the following ways:
1. Turn the routing of mini gateway off
2. Change channel of the router at home to 1-5 channel
Turn off the router, WiFi signal will not be searched. Please restore it to the factory default settings before using it again
Open the door in monitoring interface after binding the lock
Are you sure to unbind the lock?
Long press it 3s to unlock the door
Bind the lock in settings first
Your device does not support taking photos\nScanning is unavailable
No permission to visit camera. Fail to scan QR code
After closing it, you will not receive notification when the App runs in the background, which may miss important alarm messages
After logging on the gateway, user can receive alarm message timely when security devices are triggered
As the App runs in the background, user can receive alarm message timely when security devices are triggered
Use Smart Switch, Smart IR Transmitter, Smart camera and other products\n select binding equipment
Use Smart Door Guardian (720P), air conditioning, washing machine and other products\n select binding equipment

Keep the QR code close to white childe to log into gateway
After setting the location, you can check local weather conditions on Pad vision Smart Home App

WiFi repeater mode on. Do not support channel setting.

New devices are allowed to be added after selection
ZigBee/SmartRoom is a low power consumption,low speed,low complexity,high security and high Capacity short-distance wireless communication technology based on IEEE802.15.4 standard
Technology type can be seen on product package and manual
Normally,devices based on ZigBee/SmartRoom protocol can join zigbee network by quick click set key 4 times(except some products like rainbow light)
